title: How to Build a Gaming PC (2019)
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Our 2019 gaming PC build tutorial - everything you need to build a gaming computer. Subscribe to Jon Rettinger's relaunched channel!  AMD Ryzen 5 2600 CPU on Amazon:  ASUS Prime B450-Plus Motherboard on Amazon:  16GB Corsair Vengeance RAM on Amazon:  Sapphire Radeon RX 590 Graphics Card on Amazon:  500GB Crucial P1 SSD on Amazon:  1TB WD Blue Hard Drive on Amazon:  600W EVGA Power Supply on Amazon:  Fractal Design Focus G Case on Amazon:   More gaming PC build tutorials:    By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
